entry.title: Fighting for Hope
entry.summary:
Author: Zero_Nemad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,002Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 35

Summary: Stiles Stilinski, a bright young police man in training, travels to Europe with his Dad.There he suffers a terrible tragedy: Getting deported into sexual slavery.Being sold as an "American Virgin Boy Nr. 14", it appears to be his fate to provide sexual services to any customer.But one strange customer might just be his chance for freedom. Derek Hale comes from a wealthy family, defies the criminal system he was born into and tries to rescue two young girls from being trafficked.After spending years in a private prison, he finally breaks free and resumes his life's work. And he is out to take revenge.What he did not anticipate was falling in love with a young man named Stiles Stilinski. How will they escape the grasp of an internationally operating slavery syndicate?How will Stiles find trust again? Love and hope despite everything?

entry.title: Rule Number One: Don't Fall in Love With Your Best Friend's Brother
entry.summary:
Author: Violin715

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 62,219Chapters: 13/25Kudos: 319

Summary: Stiles absolutely, most definitely, totally does NOT have a crush on Derek Hale. Not at all. He doesn't.He grew up with the Hale kids and saw every embarrassing moment along the way. How could he have a crush on someone he saw cry the first time they saw their beta shift in the mirror? Someone he saw literally almost bite off their own finger while eating. No. No, Stiles definitely doesn't think about his best friend's older brother like that.What happens when the opportunity to confront his totally-not-a-crush appears: the Beacon Hills high school's Valentine's Day fundraiser.Also known as 50/50 slice of life/teen wolf drama with a hearty dose of the Hale family being a close knit family

entry.title: RUNNING POINT
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,214Chapters: 12/12Kudos: 10

Summary: Summer returns to Beacon Hills, but peace does not follow. Derek no longer plans to leave and finds himself under the tutelage of someone long thought dead and whose reappearance rewrites his idea of rules, legacy, and power. Meanwhile Stiles begins to unravel. His magic is growing unstable, his health is faltering, and time is counting down. This summer the balance of power shifts and not everyone who claims neutrality is truly without agenda.

entry.title: My Blood on his Fingertips
entry.summary:
Author: Solinvictus22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,642Chapters: 13/13Kudos: 84

Summary: In the year 2023, humanity teeters on the brink of extinction. A deadly virus known as Lycanis Nyctus has birthed a race of mutated predators called Lycans and its sub species, relentless creatures that now rule the Earth.Among the scattered survivors is Stiles, a lone human fighting to stay alive in a world where hope is nearly extinct.Meanwhile, the most powerful of the Lycans, Derek, is hunting for something called the Spark: a rare mutant immune to the virus. If Derek captures it, he could amplify his abilities and gain absolute control over the Lycan horde, bending their minds to his will.But Derek doesn’t know the whole truth. The Spark doesn’t just enhance. Under the right conditions, it holds the power to undo the mutation entirely and possibly save what’s left of humanity.
